Class MovieController

java.lang.Object
control.DatabaseController<Movie>
control.MovieController
public class MovieController extends DatabaseController<Movie>
It Represents the Movie Controller
Version:
8/11/2022
Author:

  • Method Details

    • findMovie

      public Movie findMovie(int id)
      Search for a movie by its movie id in the Movie database.
      Parameters:
      id - The Movie id
      Returns:
      movie If successful, it returns the movie by matching its unique movieid with an id in the database, else null value is returned

    • findMovies

      public ArrayList<Movie> findMovies(String title)
      Search for movies with titles with matching keywords in the Movie database.
      Parameters:
      title - The movie title
      Returns:
      moviesResult Return an array list of Movies if found, else null

    • deleteMovie

      public boolean deleteMovie(int id)
      Delete the movie in the Database file, based on the movie id attribute passed
      Parameters:
      id - The movie id
      Returns:
      boolean It returns true on successful deletion of movie in the database file, based on the movie id attribute passed

    • updateMovieAttribute

      public void updateMovieAttribute(Movie movie, MovieController.MovieAttribute attribute, Object newAttributeValue)
      It updates the selected movie's entry in Movie database with the new attribute.
      Parameters:
      movie - The name of the selected movie
      attribute - The movie attribute to be updated
      newAttributeValue - The new attribute value

    • addReviewToMovie

      public void addReviewToMovie(Movie movie, Review review)
      It adds the given Review to the given Movie's entry and updates the movie's average rating in Movie database.
      Parameters:
      movie - The name of the selected movi
      review - The New review to be added for the movie

    • sortByRating

      public ArrayList<Movie> sortByRating(ArrayList<Movie> movies)
      It sorts given list of movies in descending order based on its averageReviewRating attribute.
      Parameters:
      movies - The array list of movies
      Returns:
      movies it returns an sorted arraylist of movies

    • sortByTicketSales

      public ArrayList<Movie> sortByTicketSales(ArrayList<Movie> movies)
      It sorts given list of movies in descending order based on its ticketSales attribute.
      Parameters:
      movies - The array list of movies
      Returns:
      movies It returns an sorted arraylist of movies in descending order based on its ticketSales attribute.
